original_text: Now when they saw the boldness of Peter and John, and perceived that they were unlearned and ignorant men, they marvelled; and they took knowledge of them, that they had been with Jesus.
korean_text: 그들이 베드로와 요한이 담대하게 말함을 보고 그들을 본래 학문 없는 범인으로 알았다가 이상히 여기며 또 전에 예수와 함께 있던 줄도 알고

sentences.original_text: Now when they saw boldness of Peter and John
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그들이 베드로와 요한의 담대함을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: and perceived that they were unlearned and ignorant men
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 배우지 못한 무식한 사람들이라는 것을 깨달았을 때

sentences.original_text: and they took knowledge of them
that they had been with Jesus
